EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_PAIR_Q217.LA_Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: You are confirmed - Pivotal Analytics Roadshow
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the Pivotal Analytics Roadshow! Please see your event details below.
Date: Tuesday, 16 May 2017
Time:
8:00am - 1:15pm Strategy Session 1:15pm - 5:15pm Data Science Workshop Session (Limited Seating and for practitioners only)
Location:
ROC Santa Monica 604 Arizona Ave, Santa Monica, CA 90401 (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/604+Arizona+Ave,+Santa+Monica,+CA+90401/@34.0192735,-118.4965384,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x80c2a4cee82ba541:0xed4f8d3828389371!8m2!3d34.0192691!4d-118.4943443]]>)
Agenda:
Review the full agenda HERE <[[pivotal.io/event/pivotal-analytics-innovation-roadshow/losangeles?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=PAIR-2017]]>
If you have any questions, feel free to email Patrick Gillis at pgillis@pivotal.io <[[mailto:pgillis@pivotal.io]]>.
Sincerely,
The Pivotal Team
